text: Marion Ramsey (May 10, 1947 â€“ January 7, 2021) was an American actress and singer. She was known for her role in Cos and as Officer Laverne Hooks in the Police Academy movies. She also starred in Lavalantula and 2 Lava 2 Lantula!. Ramsey died on January 7, 2021 in Los Angeles at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Philadelphia Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:Writers from Philadelphia
